snippet: Yes, the Internet offers many distractions, but sometimes they can make us more efficient for the long haul.
abstract: Jenna Wortham Bits column contends the Internet offers many distractions, but sometimes losing herself in the Web can be invigorating; points out that instead of needing to turn off the noise of the Web, she often uses the distractions to calm her nerves so she can finish her work.
lead_paragraph: Yes, the Internet offers many distractions, but sometimes they can make us more efficient for the long haul.

headline.seo: When Internet Distractions Make Us More Efficient
headline.main: I Took a Web Detour, and Now I Feel Better
headline.print_headline: I Took a Web Detour, and Now I Feel Better
